rows.label: qev095402_MSG0001
rows.name: How is your wound?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0002
rows.name: I have healed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0003
rows.name:
Funny joke. You can't even stand.
When you lie, try to make it believable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0004
rows.name: ...It is slow to heal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0005
rows.name: I see. Then we—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0006
rows.name: Captain Slovity![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0007
rows.name: Earth aliens?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0008
rows.name: Bah. I hoped we would be safe here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0009
rows.name: Trigo! Take men and run![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0010
rows.name: I will call for backup again. Not that it helped so far...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0011
rows.name: But, Captain, that means—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0012
rows.name: It means I stay and fight![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0013
rows.name: Alone? You cannot win.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0014
rows.name:
All of us together couldn't win. So listen.
Take others and go. Do it now. RUN![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0015
rows.name: Yes, Captain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0016
rows.name: I am Slovity Pagus. I am warrior of Cavern Clan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0017
rows.name: Prone under Ganglion name me infidel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0018
rows.name: We attacked your city earlier.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0019
rows.name: Then indigens attacked my team on way back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0020
rows.name: We ran here in tatters.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0021
rows.name:
Distress calls do not go through. Or are ignored.
Either way, no help comes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0022
rows.name: No surprise for infidel like me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_JNK0010
rows.name: Negotiate

rows.label: qev095402_SEL0011
rows.name: Offer to give the Prone asylum in New LA.

rows.label: qev095402_JNK0020
rows.name: Fight

rows.label: qev095402_SEL0021
rows.name: Ready your weapons to fight Slovity.

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0023
rows.name:
It has been many suns since Cavern Clan bowed to
Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0024
rows.name:
They gave us powerful weapons. Technology.
We used them to slaughter Tree Clan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0025
rows.name:
At end of war, we became Ganglion grunts.
Meat shields.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0026
rows.name:
But my clansmen have thirst for blood.
Most were happy in new role.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0027
rows.name:
So if we desert to New LA? What then?
What would merciful Earth aliens ask of us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0028
rows.name:
We would certainly fight Tree Clan there.
Maybe kill them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0029
rows.name:
Might also kill Earth aliens. Or other aliens.
Hard to tell with Cavern Clan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0030
rows.name: War and pillage are only things we know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0032
rows.name: ...There. That should buy them enough time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0033
rows.name: Now I must thin your numbers![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0034
rows.name: Heh. Clever Earth alien. You knew I was buying time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095402_MSG0035
rows.name: Now I will just stall you by force![ST:wait ]
